verses.verse: <S%G2532><s%> <S%G3326>After<s%> <S%G5023>this,<s%> I <S%G1492>saw<s%> <S%G5064>four<s%> <S%G32>angels<s%> <S%G2476>standing<s%> <S%G1909>at<s%> the <S%G5064>four<s%> <S%G1137>corners<s%> of the <S%G1093>earth,<s%> <S%G2902>holding<s%> the <S%G5064>four<s%> <S%G417>winds<s%> of the <S%G1093>earth,<s%> so <S%G2443>that<s%> <S%G3361>no<s%> <S%G417>wind<s%> would <S%G4154>blow<s%> <S%G1909>on<s%> the <S%G1093>earth,<s%> <S%G3383>or<s%> <S%G1909>on<s%> the <S%G2281>sea,<s%> <S%G3383>or<s%> <S%G1909>on<s%> <S%G3956>any<s%> <S%G1186>tree.<s%>

<S%G2532><s%> I <S%G1492>saw<s%> <S%G243>another<s%> <S%G32>angel<s%> <S%G305>ascend<s%> <S%G575>from<s%> the <S%G2246>sunrise,<s%> <S%G2246><s%> <S%G2192>having<s%> the <S%G4973>seal<s%> of the <S%G2198>living<s%> <S%G2316>God.<s%> <S%G2532><s%> He <S%G2896>cried<s%> with a <S%G3173>loud<s%> <S%G5456>voice<s%> to the <S%G5064>four<s%> <S%G32>angels<s%> to <S%G3739>whom<s%> <S%G846>it<s%> was <S%G1325>given<s%> to <S%G91>harm<s%> the <S%G1093>earth<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> the <S%G2281>sea,<s%>

<S%G3004>saying,<s%> <S%G3361>"Don't<s%> <S%G91>harm<s%> the <S%G1093>earth,<s%> <S%G3383>neither<s%> the <S%G2281>sea,<s%> <S%G3383>nor<s%> the <S%G1186>trees,<s%> <S%G891>until<s%> <S%G3739><s%> we have <S%G4972>sealed<s%> the <S%G1401>bondservants<s%> of <S%G2257>our<s%> <S%G2316>God<s%> <S%G1909>on<s%> <S%G846>their<s%> <S%G3359>foreheads!<s%>"

<S%G2532><s%> I <S%G191>heard<s%> the <S%G706>number<s%> of <S%G3588>those<s%> who were <S%G4972>sealed,<s%> one <S%G1540>hundred<s%> <S%G5062>forty<s%> - <S%G5064>four<s%> <S%G5505>thousand,<s%> <S%G4972>sealed<s%> out <S%G1537>of<s%> <S%G3956>every<s%> <S%G5443>tribe<s%> of the <S%G5207>children<s%> of <S%G2474>Israel:<s%>

<S%G1537>of<s%> the <S%G5443>tribe<s%> of <S%G2448>Judah<s%> were <S%G4972>sealed<s%> <S%G1427>twelve<s%> <S%G5505>thousand,<s%> <S%G1537>of<s%> the <S%G5443>tribe<s%> of <S%G4502>Reuben<s%> <S%G1427>twelve<s%> <S%G5505>thousand,<s%> <S%G1537>of<s%> the <S%G5443>tribe<s%> of <S%G1045>Gad<s%> <S%G1427>twelve<s%> <S%G5505>thousand,<s%>

<S%G1537>of<s%> the <S%G5443>tribe<s%> of <S%G768>Asher<s%> <S%G1427>twelve<s%> <S%G5505>thousand,<s%> <S%G1537>of<s%> the <S%G5443>tribe<s%> of <S%G3508>Naphtali<s%> <S%G1427>twelve<s%> <S%G5505>thousand,<s%> <S%G1537>of<s%> the <S%G5443>tribe<s%> of <S%G3128>Manasseh<s%> <S%G1427>twelve<s%> <S%G5505>thousand,<s%>

<S%G1537>of<s%> the <S%G5443>tribe<s%> of <S%G4826>Simeon<s%> <S%G1427>twelve<s%> <S%G5505>thousand,<s%> <S%G1537>of<s%> the <S%G5443>tribe<s%> of <S%G3017>Levi<s%> <S%G1427>twelve<s%> <S%G5505>thousand,<s%> <S%G1537>of<s%> the <S%G5443>tribe<s%> of <S%G2466>Issachar<s%> <S%G1427>twelve<s%> <S%G5505>thousand,<s%>

<S%G1537>of<s%> the <S%G5443>tribe<s%> of <S%G2194>Zebulun<s%> <S%G1427>twelve<s%> <S%G5505>thousand,<s%> <S%G1537>of<s%> the <S%G5443>tribe<s%> of <S%G2501>Joseph<s%> <S%G1427>twelve<s%> <S%G5505>thousand,<s%> <S%G1537>of<s%> the <S%G5443>tribe<s%> of <S%G958>Benjamin<s%> were <S%G4972>sealed<s%> <S%G1427>twelve<s%> <S%G5505>thousand.<s%>

<S%G3326>After<s%> these <S%G5023>things<s%> I <S%G1492>looked,<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G2400>behold,<s%> a <S%G4183>great<s%> <S%G3793>multitude,<s%> <S%G3739>which<s%> <S%G3762>no<s%> <S%G846>man<s%> <S%G1410>could<s%> <S%G705>number,<s%> out <S%G1537>of<s%> <S%G3956>every<s%> <S%G1484>nation<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> of all <S%G5443>tribes,<s%> <S%G2532><s%> <S%G2992>peoples,<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G1100>languages,<s%> <S%G2476>standing<s%> <S%G1799>before<s%> the <S%G2362>throne<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G1799>before<s%> the <S%G721>Lamb,<s%> <S%G4016>dressed<s%> in <S%G3022>white<s%> <S%G4749>robes,<s%> <S%G2532>with<s%> palm <S%G5404>branches<s%> <S%G1722>in<s%> <S%G846>their<s%> <S%G5495>hands.<s%>

<S%G2532><s%> They <S%G2896>cried<s%> with a <S%G3173>loud<s%> <S%G5456>voice,<s%> <S%G3004>saying,<s%> <S%G4991>"Salvation<s%> be to <S%G2257>our<s%> <S%G2316>God,<s%> <S%G3588>who<s%> <S%G2521>sits<s%> <S%G1909>on<s%> the <S%G2362>throne,<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> to the <S%G721>Lamb!<s%>"

<S%G2532><s%> <S%G3956>All<s%> the <S%G32>angels<s%> were <S%G2476>standing<s%> <S%G2945>around<s%> the <S%G2362>throne,<s%> <S%G2532><s%> the <S%G4245>elders,<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> the <S%G5064>four<s%> living <S%G2226>creatures;<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> they <S%G4098>fell<s%> <S%G1909>on<s%> <S%G846>their<s%> <S%G4383>faces<s%> <S%G1799>before<s%> his <S%G2362>throne,<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G4352>worshiped<s%> <S%G2316>God,<s%>

<S%G2532><s%> <S%G1520>One<s%> <S%G1537>of<s%> the <S%G4245>elders<s%> <S%G611>answered,<s%> <S%G3004>saying<s%> to <S%G3427>me,<s%> <S%G3778>"These<s%> <S%G5101>who<s%> <S%G1526>are<s%> <S%G4016>arrayed<s%> in <S%G3022>white<s%> <S%G4749>robes,<s%> who are <S%G2532>they,<s%> and from where did <S%G4159>they<s%> <S%G2064>come?<s%>"

<S%G2532><s%> I <S%G2046>told<s%> <S%G846>him,<s%> "My <S%G2962>lord,<s%> <S%G4771>you<s%> <S%G1492>know.<s%>" <S%G2532><s%> He <S%G2036>said<s%> to <S%G3427>me,<s%> <S%G3778>"These<s%> <S%G1526>are<s%> those who <S%G2064>came<s%> <S%G1537>out<s%> of the <S%G3173>great<s%> <S%G2347>tribulation.<s%> <S%G2532><s%> They <S%G4150>washed<s%> <S%G846>their<s%> <S%G4749>robes,<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G3021>made<s%> <S%G846>them<s%> <S%G3021>white<s%> <S%G1722>in<s%> the <S%G4749>Lamb<s%>'s <S%G129>blood.<s%>

<S%G1223>Therefore<s%> <S%G5124><s%> <S%G1526>they<s%> are <S%G1799>before<s%> the <S%G2362>throne<s%> of <S%G2316>God,<s%> <S%G2532><s%> <S%G1526>they<s%> <S%G3000>serve<s%> <S%G846>him<s%> <S%G2250>day<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G3571>night<s%> <S%G1722>in<s%> <S%G846>his<s%> <S%G3485>temple.<s%> <S%G2532><s%> <S%G3588>He<s%> who <S%G2521>sits<s%> <S%G1909>on<s%> the <S%G2362>throne<s%> will spread his <S%G4637>tabernacle<s%> over <S%G846>them.<s%>

<S%G3754>for<s%> the <S%G721>Lamb<s%> <S%G3588>who<s%> is <S%G303>in<s%> the <S%G3319>midst<s%> of the <S%G2362>throne<s%> <S%G4165>shepherds<s%> <S%G846>them,<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G3594>leads<s%> <S%G846>them<s%> <S%G1909>to<s%> <S%G4077>springs<s%> of <S%G5204>waters<s%> of <S%G2198>life.<s%> <S%G2532>And<s%> <S%G2316>God<s%> will wipe <S%G1813>away<s%> <S%G3956>every<s%> <S%G1144>tear<s%> <S%G575>from<s%> <S%G846>their<s%> <S%G3788>eyes.<s%>"
